title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2007)
creator_credit: Alfred Zerfas, Christine Lamb, Edwin Whiting, Joyce Evans, Llywellyn Staiff, Louise Blake, Lyn McLeavy, Martin Zerfas, Sally McCutcheon, Sonya Waters, Sue Silk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Eleven stories from members of the general public. Mostly autobiographical, they are stories that concern themselves mostly with the passions of the creator, whether social issues, history, hobbies or family. These passions and interests are what makes the participants who they are.
creator_credit_for_label: Alfred Zerfas, Christine Lamb, Edwin Whiting, Joyce Evans, Llywellyn Staiff, Louise Blake, Lyn McLeavy, Martin Zerfas, Sally McCutcheon, Sonya Waters, Sue Silk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
